column4: when using sudo apt-get can I get a different version of php other then 5.1.6.. I need 5.2
so I will need to download and compile it..
I am trying to build and install apache2. I downloaded and tried to configure using ./configure --enable-so... I get the following error  configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
your missing the build essentials package
When you told me that I was missing build essentials, did you mean for ubuntu in general or did you mean for apache?
